channel.title: All The Interface-Creating Methods/Information You Know
channel.description:
Well... I made this topic because I'm wanting to release the new interface maker with many features. The reason I'm posting it here is because I won't get shit in the help section, and I don't really need help, but the more information people give me on hard coding interfaces, the better it will be.
[b]Specific things I'm looking for[/b] -Models on interface -Text boxes -How scroll bars work -Button mouse down images. I have the hovering down.
Anyone presenting me with what I need will be in the credits (Yea, sorry, nothing more I can do =\). I know I can probably find half of this information by looking at some complicated interface and snatching the methods it uses, but is it really worth it?
As for things like images, buttons, and labels/clickable labels, I already have those. The 4 lists above are what I really want.
Thanks,
~Lin

That answered my question. Removed my old post.

item.title: All The Interface-Creating Methods/Information You Know
item.dc:creator: @Tonic Tonic
item.description:
@Tonic wrote:

Add model Method, maybe useful.

public static void addModel(int ID, int anInt236, int mId, int modelZoom, int modelRT, int modelRT2){ Class9 Tab = addInterface(ID); Tab.anInt250 = ID; Tab.anInt236 = anInt236; Tab.anInt262 = 6; Tab.anInt217 = 0; Tab.anInt233 = 1; Tab.anInt214 = 0; Tab.anInt220 = 512; Tab.anInt267 = 334; Tab.aByte254 = 0; Tab.anInt230 = -1; Tab.anInt234 = mId; Tab.anInt269 = modelZoom; Tab.anInt270 = modelRT; Tab.anInt271 = modelRT2; }

Read full topic

item.title: All The Interface-Creating Methods/Information You Know
item.dc:creator: @Teh_Moose Teh Moose
item.description:
@Teh_Moose wrote:

Ok, I’m pretty sure this is how scroll bars work but don’t get mad at me if I’m wrong. Everything in the scroll “box” is a seperate interface and the scroll bar is part of it. It has a seperate interface ID from the rest of the interface. I even made it so scroll bars work with your mouse wheel on my client. I could help you with that if you want.

Read full topic
item.source: All The Interface-Creating Methods/Information You Know
